title: LoL HFT #13 Salty Riven

embed.description: She was like 80% salt. body: Just a short one this time, lemme know what you think :)

replies.body:
You laugh like Nami does :p

I honestly feel bad for the Riven.
Well that's a new one! The Riv was having a pretty rough game ey.
Nice vid. Subbed looking forward to more.
